    Recuperer la version du dsfr de 'shinygouv'

    get_dsfr_version.Rd

    Recuperer la version du dsfr de 'shinygouv'

    get_dsfr_version(with_v = FALSE)

    Arguments

    with_v

    Logical. Whether to return with "v" in front of the number

    Valeur de retour

    Character. Numero de version

    Examples

    get_dsfr_version()
#> [1] "1.9.3"
get_dsfr_version(with_v = TRUE)
#> [1] "v1.9.3"
